front.title: Constrained Join Proxy for Bootstrapping Protocols

abstract.t: This document defines a protocol to securely assign a pledge to an owner, using an intermediary node between pledge and owner. This intermediary node is known as a "constrained-join-proxy". This document extends the work of [I-D.ietf-anima-bootstrapping-keyinfra] by replacing the Circuit- proxy by a stateless constrained join-proxy, that uses IP encapsulation.
